create_followButton.description: press this button to follow a user on Pinterest

create_msgLoginFail.description: Message shown when someone's login changes while the board picker is open
create_msgLoginFail.message: 很抱歉！此處發生錯誤。請確認你已登入 Pinterest，然後再試一次。

create_msgPromoteYourPin.description: Message seen by partners after they've created a new Pin, inviting them over to Pinterest to promote it.

create_msgSeeOnPinterest.description: pin / board create success button when multiple images are selected

create_msgSendAfterSave.description: pin create success button to send pin to other users

create_placeholderFilterAddBoard.description: placeholder text in Create Board input

create_placeholderFilterAddSection.description: placeholder text in Create Section input

errorPin.description: The error message seen when an image can't be pinned
errorPin.message: 很抱歉，無法儲存此圖片。

extDescription.description: The extension's description, seen in gallery and extensions page
extDescription.message: 儲存你在網路上看到的內容。

extName.description: The extension's title, seen in gallery and extensions page

grid_choosePin.description: Header message in the image picker overlay

grid_choosePinMultiSelectHeader.description: New header message in the image picker overlay

grid_choosePinMultiSelectSubHeader.description: Subheader in the image picker overlay

grid_loadingMessage.description: Loading message while scraping images for the user

grid_nextAction.description: Press this button to go to the Create view when multiple images are selected

logic_noPinDomain.description: The default message we alert when someone tries to use the browser button on a forbidden domain
logic_noPinDomain.message: 很抱歉，我們並未開放從該網域收藏釘圖。若有疑問，請聯絡網站操作人員。

optionHide.description: Text next to the checkbox that turns off hoverbuttons

saveAction.description: Appears wherever we show a Save button or menu prompt

save_boardPickerSuccessLabel.description: Label in inline board picker after pin creation

save_help.description: Get help after a Pin create failure

save_visitButton.description: Pin create success button to visit pin

searchAction.description: Appears in the right-click-to-search menu item

search_failHeaderMsg.description: Header shown when search fails to return results
